name: Syntra
headline: AI OS for Private Practice Doctors
description:
Syntra is the all-in-one solution for private practice doctors. Our operating system includes a personalized EHR that automates administrative tasks for doctors, such as patient intake, scribing, billing, and inventory management. 

Practices are switching off of solutions they have used for over a decade, calling Syntra "the only solution that doesn’t need to be managed.”

founders.name: Ayush Jain, Founder
founders.description:
Ayush is the co-founder and CEO of Syntra.

Before Syntra, Ayush was awarded the Goldwater Scholarship for his work on using EHR Data to simulate clinical trials. He studied Computer Science and Chemistry at Duke University where he first-authored papers in international AI + Healthcare conferences, featuring his work at the Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard and Duke AI Health.

founders.name: Aniketh Kolla, Founder
founders.description:
Aniketh is the co-founder and CTO of Syntra.

Before Syntra, Aniketh was studying Mathematics and Computer Science at Duke University. He has presented several papers at national conferences and was the lead engineer responsible for scaling an app from 0 to 8 million users.

generated_description:
### Syntra: Revolutionizing Private Practice with AI

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Syntra is positioning itself as a game-changer for private practice doctors. Its mission? To create an AI Operating System specifically tailored to the needs of healthcare providers. This isn’t just a pipe dream; it’s a well-thought-out solution that's gaining traction among practices willing to shake off dated systems they've relied on for years.

#### What Do They Offer?

At its core, Syntra provides an all-in-one platform designed to simplify the complexities of running a healthcare practice. Their Electronic Health Record (EHR) system automates key administrative tasks that often bog down physicians, including:

- **Patient Intake**: Seamless onboarding of new patients.
- **Scribing**: An impressive feature that allows real-time documentation of patient encounters through AI-powered ambient listening.
- **Billing**: Streamlined invoicing and financial tracking.
- **Inventory Management**: Keeping tabs on supplies and resources effortlessly.
- **Patient Portal**: Enhancing patient engagement with easy access to their health information.
- **Customization Options**: Tailoring the system to fit specific practice needs.

Doctors are quickly deeming Syntra “the only solution that doesn’t need to be managed.” It’s clear that Syntra is not just another software; it's an embedded ally in private healthcare, allowing practitioners to focus on what really matters—patient care.

#### The Team

Although small, with a dedicated team of two, Syntra is making a big impact. They're anchored in a robust network provided by Y Combinator, which is no small feat for a recent startup. This partnership not only enhances their credibility but also offers valuable mentorship and resources as they scale.

#### Why It Matters

The healthcare landscape is shifting. Medical professionals are increasingly demanding tools that alleviate administrative burdens and enhance clinical efficiency. Syntra is stepping up to meet this demand with a solution that is not only innovative but also user-friendly.

For those curious to see how Syntra can transform their practice, booking a demo is straightforward. Interested parties can reach out to the founders directly at [founders@syntra.com](mailto:founders@syntra.com). 

As the practice of medicine continues to evolve alongside technological advancements, Syntra is poised to lead the charge in making life easier for doctors everywhere. Check out their [website](https://www.syntra.com) for more information.
